data.title: Bernd Eichinger
data.meta_description: Bernd Eichinger. Producer: Der Untergang. Bernd Eichinger was born on 11 April 1949 in Neuburg an der Donau, Bavaria, Germany. He was a producer and writer, known for Der Untergang (2004), Der Baader Meinhof Komplex (2008) and Das Parfum - Die Geschichte eines Mörders (2006). He was married to Katja Hofmann. He died on 24 January 2011 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
data.text: Bernd Eichinger was born on April 11, 1949 in Neuburg an der Donau, Bavaria, Germany. He was a producer and writer, known for Der Untergang (2004), Der Baader Meinhof Komplex (2008) and Das Parfum - Die Geschichte eines Mörders (2006). He was married to Katja Hofmann. He died on January 24, 2011 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
